tossup_question: 8) EARTH AND SPACE  Cratons, old stable parts of the lithosphere, would most likely be found in which of the following locations?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Inside of continents
X) Margins of continents
Y) Inside oceanic trench
Z) Margins of oceanic trench
bonus_question: 8) EARTH AND SPACE  Coccolithophores and foraminifera in the ocean die, forming calcareous ooze. What sedimentary rock forms from the lithification of calcareous ooze?
